original_text: In the evening, Jacob came in from the fields. Leah went out to meet him. She said, ‘You must sleep with me tonight. I have paid for you with my son's mandrakes.’ So Jacob slept with Leah that night.
korean_text: 저물 때에 야곱이 들에서 돌아오매 레아가 나와서 그를 영접하며 이르되 내게로 들어오라 내가 내 아들의 합환채로 당신을 샀노라 그 밤에 야곱이 그와 동침하였더라

sentences.original_text: Jacob came in from the fields
Leah went out to meet him
You must sleep with me tonight
I have paid for you with my son's mandrakes
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 아들의 만드레이크로 당신을 위해 지불했습니다

sentences.original_text: So Jacob slept with Leah that night
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 야곱이 그날 밤 레아과 함께 잤습니다
